document.heading: Primary Date Alteration Amendment Act of 2014

history.narrative: Law 20-273, the “Primary Date Alteration Amendment Act of 2014,” was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 20-265. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on December 2, 2014, and December 17, 2014, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on February 6, 2015, it was assigned Act No. 20-620 and transmitted to Congress for its review. D.C. Law 20-273 became effective May 2, 2015.
